{"step_by_step_thinking": "Antiflux is a substance that prevents or reduces the formation of flux, which is a substance used in metallurgy to promote fusion of metals. Graphite, boric acid, and calcium carbonate with alcohol are all used as antifluxes in various contexts. Iron oxide, on the other hand, is not typically used as an antiflux. Instead, it is often a component of fluxes.", "answer_choice": "C. Iron oxide"}
